examples.korean: She pleaded with him but he remained unmoved. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그에게 간청했지만 그는 여전히 냉정했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She pleaded with him but he remained unmoved. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bonfire was still smouldering the next day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모닥불은 그 다음 날에도 여전히 타고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bonfire was still smouldering the next day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Despite these measures, the economy remains in the doldrums. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이러한 조치들에도 불구하고 경제가 여전히 부진하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Despite these measures, the economy remains in the doldrums. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After so many years she was still instantly recognizable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇게 여러 해가 지났는데도 그녀는 여전히 즉각 알아볼 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After so many years she was still instantly recognizable. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The trade deficit remains the soft underbelly of the US economy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무역 적자가 여전히 미국 경제에서 가장 취약한 부분이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
